Style/ConditionalAssignment.description:
Description

Use the return value of `if` and `case` statements for assignment to a variable and variable comparison instead of assigning that variable inside of each branch.
Style/ConditionalAssignment.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

EnforcedStyle: assign_to_condition (type: str)
SupportedStyles: ['assign_to_condition', 'assign_inside_condition'] (type: list)
SingleLineConditionsOnly: True (type: bool)
IncludeTernaryExpressions: True (type: bool)
